name: Scarlet Eyes
description: 24-karat gold case and bracelet. Scarlet Eyes adds a bold pop of color to any ensemble while exuding sophistication and style.

name: Sultriness
description: White gold case and obsidian bracelet with 35 rubies. Sultriness epitomizes timeless sophistication and opulence.

name: RedOasis
description: White gold case and black leather strap. RedOasis exudes bold elegance and luxury.

name: Enigma's Charm
description: 24-karat gold case with black gold accents and matching bracelet. Enigma's Charm offers a striking fusion of luxury and contemporary design.

name: Fey Whisper
description: 24-karat gold case and bracelet. Fey Whisper exudes refined elegance with a touch of sophistication.

name: Aurora's Tear
description: White gold case and bracelet. Aurora's Tear epitomizes understated luxury and timeless sophistication.

name: Leviathan
description: White gold case adorned with 118 diamonds and matching bracelet. Leviathan offers a contemporary twist on classic timepiece design with a touch of boldness and sophistication.

name: Triton's Wrath
description: 24-karat gold case and sleek black bracelet. Triton's Wrath exudes an air of modern elegance and sophistication with a bold, understated presence.

name: Cerulean
description: 24-karat gold case and matching black bracelet. Cerulean offers a timeless yet modern aesthetic that exudes understated luxury and refinement.

name: Elegance
description: Experience opulence with our NTL Golden Elegance timepiece, a stunning addition to our Luxe Gold Collection. Crafted from 100% pure 24-carat gold, this watch epitomizes luxury and sophistication. Elevate your style with timeless elegance and unparalleled craftsmanship
